name: HEAVEN IN A BOX
description: Box may include a selection of Seasonal Bars, Dark Chocolate Brownies, Shortbread, Chocolate Chip Cookies, a Seasonal Cookie Offering, and Peanut Brittle. Note some products contain nuts.

name: DARK CHOCOLATE EXPLOSION COOKIES
description: Fresh creamery butter, flour, brown sugar, Valrhona cocoa, bittersweet chocolate, eggs, milk, leavening, pure Madagascar vanilla extract, confectioners’ sugar, kosher salt.

name: CHOCOLATE SABLE COOKIES
description: Fresh creamery butter, Valrhona cocoa, flour, bittersweet chocolate, dark brown + white sugars, pure Madagascar vanilla bean paste, Maldon salt, leavening.

name: BRIOCHE DOUGHNUT
description: Flour, sugar, fresh yeast, fresh creamery butter, eggs, fresh cream, whole milk, sugar, vanilla bean, corn starch, gelatin, kosher salt.

name: COOKIE OF THE MONTH SUBSCRIPTION 6 pcs
description:
For the love of cookies! Each month, you will receive (or send to someone very lucky) an order of our cookies. With our Cookie Subscription, each month one order of a cookie flavor comes right to your door. Selection may include: chocolate chip, ginger snap, linzer, chocolate explosion, cardamom snickerdoodle or shortbread. It’s the sweetest thing we can think of doing for anyone! 
After the first cookie shipment, monthly cookie subscriptions are sent on the first Monday of each month (holidays and weather permitting). Please refer to individual flavors for ingredient information.
